tool.name: Data collection from query
tool.help:
**What it does**
Creates a data collection consisting of documents from the `Manually Annotated Sub-Corpus <http://www.anc.org/data/masc/>`_ (MASC 3.0.0) that match a given query (e.g., a specific genre).
Only simple queries based on simple path matching can be used at the moment. The following terms may be used:
1. data 2. spoken 3. court-transcript 4. debate-transcript 5. face-to-face 6. telephone 7. written 8. blog 9. email 10. enron 11. spam 12. w3c 13. essays 14. ficlets 15. fiction 16. govt-docs 17. jokes 18. journal 19. letters 20. philanthropic-fundraising 21. solicitation-brochures 22. movie-script 23. newspaper 24. nyt 25. unknown 26. wsj 27. non-fiction 28. technical 29. travel-guides 30. twitter
There is currently no support for wildcards.
